public ref class AesCryptoServiceProvider sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::Aes

summary.span: 執行對稱式加密和解密使用進階加密標準 (AES) 演算法的密碼編譯應用程式開發介面 (CAPI) 實作。

span.span: Performs symmetric encryption and decryption using the Cryptographic Application Programming Interfaces (CAPI) implementation of the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何加密和解密使用範例資料類別。The following example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt sample data using the class. summary.span: 取得或設定大小，以位元為單位的祕密金鑰。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the secret key.

value.span: 金鑰的大小 (以位元為單位)。

span.span: The size, in bits, of the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最小金鑰大小是 128 位元，以及大小上限是 256 位元。The minimum size of the key is 128 bits, and the maximum size is 256 bits. 變更`KeySize`值重設金鑰，並產生新的隨機金鑰。Changing the `KeySize` value resets the key and generates a new random key. 發生這種情況時`KeySize`屬性 setter 會叫用 （包括當它已指派相同的值）。This happens whenever the `KeySize` property setter is invoked (including when it's assigned the same value).
